title: Unstoppable Domains
about-unstoppable: Replace cryptocurrency addresses with a human readable name.

error.stripe-payment: Payment failed. Please try again later
error.something-went-wrong: Something went wrong! Please try again.

warning.not-enough-char: Domain name is less than 6 characters.

view-transfer-transaction: You can view the transfer transaction on
